wikipedia_page.main: John "Jack" Charles Jenkins (19 April 1880 – 1 December 1971) was a Welsh international rugby union forward who played club rugby for Newport and London Welsh. He won just a single cap for Wales in 1907 but faced both New Zealand and South Africa at county level with Middlesex and Monmouthshire.

response: * Jack Jenkins (rugby union) (1880–1971), Wales international rugby union player
* Jack Jenkins (Welsh footballer) (1892–1946), Welsh international player
